title: Ticket #755: Add user log file rotation option
description:
(Based on a report by Scot Kronenfeld for the VDT.)

My Condor cron job runs every 5 minutes. It has a user log file that is growing at ~1MB/week. That's obviously not going to cause imminent problems, but since I intend to run this job indefinitely, I'll have to pay attention and delete that file at some point. Also, if I were running many jobs at that rate, it could cause problems.

Proposal: allow the submit file to request some sort of user log rotation and deletion.

If #754 is implemented, it may be useful to allow the output and error files to be rotated and deleted similarly.
